title: A role generated by AI, aka trickster

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Disguise (2 uses) - Choose a player to disguise as. Your name and role will appear as the player you disguised as to others. Your target will be notified that they have been disguised. The disguise lasts until you choose to cancel it, until you are investigated by a Sheriff, or until you die.
Chaos (2 uses) - Choose a player to cause chaos for. All actions performed on and by the target player will fail for the next day and night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Immune to role blocking.
Immune to transport.
Cannot be healed by a Doctor.
Appears as suspicious to a Sheriff when investigated.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Can win with any faction, but cannot win if they are the last player alive.
